Text: I re-uploaded this because of seeding issues, hope this works.
I guess it is working, many thanks to all the scanners, leechers, seeders and the TPB team, let's seed this one until the end of time.
Thanks for the re-up, it's working for me now! On the seedbox it will stay xD

This is a really great upload, thanks! Except for the tie-in issues, I had ASM up until 531. 

I only had this problem though:
"RAR comic archive 'The Amazing Spider-Man #403c (Spectacular Spider-Man #226)' may be corrupt"

So, that was the only issue I could not open.
Thanks so much for uploading and re uploading this. Really wanted to get into this series.

thanks very much for sharing Zlenny!

spidey fans need to read this: http://www.bleedingcool.com/2013/01/21/what-did-mary-jane-watson-really-say-to-mephisto/

that shit right there just blew my mind.
a shame she doesn't know Spidey is not Peter...especially considering all the years they, 'shared a toothbrush.'

Thank you very much!!!! I am a newcomer to comics and it's great that I can read the original story line from the beginning. Plus my bf is a huge Spider-man fan but he never had the chance to read from the beginning. Will def be seeding for awhile. Thank you again!!!!!
Had to leave another comment because for a 10gb+ file it is actually downloading very fast. Cheers uploader and seeders!!!

The Other One Wasn't Working, It Had No Seeds At All.. So I Came Across This One.. IF It Does DL Completely, I'll Continue To Seed For A While. This Is Worth It.
Spiderman Is A MUST HAVE.

:3.

I've already downloaded this and in the seedbox it will stay for a loooooongg time. Thank you very much for this incredible work....all the "amazing" comics and all the story arc are in this torrent. It is just AMAZING :-P. Greetings, from Argentina. Bye!!!
